So, I would've given this 5 stars. Buttttt it feels like it runs a little small. The main issue however, is that it randomly says "Little Hell Boy" on the front? I'm all for saying screw gender norms but I'm a woman trying to buy clothes that were labeled as women's clothes. Why put a random edgy bit of text on the front especially if you're not going to mention that the text is on there in the advertisement? It's a very unusual choice. Though I do have some trans friends who may enjoy this. But yeah, definitely think it should be mentioned in the description that it says "Little Hell Boy" lmao. Sounds very edgy 😂

Ordered for my daughter to wear to school. Was not aware the front said “lil hell boy”(I think it’s boy) until we got it. Definitely would not have ordered had we known that because she cannot wear it to school as it’s “inappropriate”. Checked the description thinking we both missed it and saw nothing about the writing. If you look closely at the product images, you can see there’s some sort of writing, but even that’s at an angle. So just a heads up, unless you want to walk around with “lil hell boy” on your chest, I’d keep looking.
